languages.text: [Задумчиво взять шпажку с канапе] "Вера меняет людей. Возьмите томик псалмов и читайте ему, пока не сознается".
[Pensively take an appetiser] "Faith changes people. Take a book of psalms and read it to him until he confesses."
languages.original_text: [Задумчиво взять шпажку с канапе] "Вера меняет людей. Возьмите томик псалмов и читайте ему, пока не сознается".

languages.text: [Nachdenklich einen Aperitif nehmen] "Der Glaube verändert die Leute. Lest ihm aus einem Buch mit Psalmen vor, bis er gesteht."
languages.original_text: [Pensively take an appetiser] "Faith changes people. Take a book of psalms and read it to him until he confesses."

traits.locale_text: [Nachdenklich einen Aperitiv nehmen] "Der Glaube verändert die Leute. Lest ihm aus einem Buch mit Psalmen vor, bis er gesteht."

languages.text: [Prendre un gâteau apéritif d'un air pensif] « La foi change les gens. Lisez-lui un recueil de psaumes jusqu'à ce qu'il avoue. »
languages.original_text: [Pensively take an appetiser] "Faith changes people. Take a book of psalms and read it to him until he confesses."

traits.locale_text: [Prendre un gâteau apéritif d'un air pensif] « La foi change les gens. Lisez-lui un recueil de psaumes jusqu'à ce qu'il avoue. »

languages.text: [Coger un aperitivo con aire pensativo] «La fe cambia a las personas. Coja un devocionario y recítele salmos hasta que confiese».
languages.original_text: [Pensively take an appetiser] "Faith changes people. Take a book of psalms and read it to him until he confesses."

traits.locale_text: [Coger un aperitivo con aire pensativo] «La fe cambia a las personas. Coja un devocionario y recítele salmos hasta que confiese».

languages.text: [物思いにふけりつつ前菜を取る]「信仰は人を変える。聖歌の本を持って行って、自白するまで読み続けてやれ」
languages.original_text: [Pensively take an appetiser] "Faith changes people. Take a book of psalms and read it to him until he confesses."

traits.locale_text: [物思いにふけりつつ前菜を取る]「信仰は人を変える。聖歌の本を持って行って、自白するまで読み続けてやれ」

languages.text: [若有所思地喝一口餐前酒]“信仰能改变人。拿一本祷告书念给他听，直到他认罪为止。”
languages.original_text: [Pensively take an appetiser] "Faith changes people. Take a book of psalms and read it to him until he confesses."

traits.locale_text: [若有所思地喝一口餐前酒]“信仰能改变人。拿一本祷告书念给他听，直到他认罪为止。”

languages.text: [Tedirginlikle ağzına bir çerez at] "İnanç, insanları değiştirir. Bir ilahi kitabı bulup itirafını duyana kadar okuyun."
languages.original_text: [Pensively take an appetiser] "Faith changes people. Take a book of psalms and read it to him until he confesses."
